TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MenuItemBindingCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection
Public NotInheritable Class MenuItemBindingCollection Inherits StateManagedCollection
public ref class MenuItemBindingCollection sealed : System::Web::UI::StateManagedCollection

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于存储和管理一系列中的对象控件。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in the control. 控件使用类的数据类型作为其属性。The control uses the class as the data type for its property. 属性用来存储为定义的任何菜单项绑定控件。The property is used to store any menu item bindings defined for the control. > [!NOTE] > 依据的顺序对象会显示在集合具有对这些对象应用于菜单项的方式没有影响控件。The order in which objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a control. 类支持采用多种方式来访问集合中的项：The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用索引器直接检索特定的从零开始索引处的对象。Use the indexer to directly retrieve the object at a specific zero-based index. - 使用方法来创建可用于循环访问集合的枚举器。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用方法将集合的内容复制到一个数组。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into an array. 你可以以编程方式管理通过添加和删除对象对象。You can programmatically manage a object by adding and removing objects. 若要向集合添加菜单项，请使用或方法。To add menu items to the collection, use the or the method. 若要从集合中删除节点，请使用，则，或方法。To remove nodes from the collection, use the , the , or the method. 类包含属性和方法，可用于检索有关集合本身的信息。The class contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself. 若要确定集合中有多少项，使用属性。To find out how many items are in the collection, use the property. 如果你想要确定集合是否包含特定对象，请使用方法。If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain object, use the method. 若要获取的索引对象在集合中，使用方法。To get the index of a object in the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何填充对象以声明方式。The following code example demonstrates how to populate a object declaratively. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Map.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuBindings/CS/menubindingscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuBindings/VB/menubindingsvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何添加对象添加到对象以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to add objects to a object programmatically. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Map.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBindingCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingCollectionAdd/CS/menuitembindingcollectionaddcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBindingCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingCollectionAdd/VB/menuitembindingcollectionaddvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。The following is sample site map data for the previous examples. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以追加指定到集合末尾的对象。Use the method to append the specified object to the end of the collection. > [!NOTE] > 可以添加 null 值和重复到集合的对象。You can add null values and duplicate objects to the collection. 或者，可以插入中使用特定索引处的集合对象方法。As an alternative, you can insert a object in the collection at a specific index by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 依据的顺序对象会显示在集合具有对这些对象应用于菜单项的方式没有影响控件。The order in which objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将追加对象的末尾的集合控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to append a object to the end of the collection of a control. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Map.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以确定是否集合中包含对象。Use the method to determine whether a object is contained in the collection. 此方法通常用于测试是否存在之前执行任务，例如添加或从集合中删除菜单项绑定的对象。This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a object before performing a task, such as adding or removing a menu item binding from the collection.

span.span: Copies all the items from the object to a compatible one-dimensional array of objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将集合的内容复制到指定的从零开始数组。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified zero-based array. 目标数组的指定索引处开始复制项。Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array. 在阵列中，你可以然后使用数组语法访问中的项对象。With the array, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the object. 或者，还可以使用方法来创建可用于访问集合中的项的枚举器。As an alternative, you can also use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法复制对象从集合到一个数组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the objects from the collection to an array. 然后循环访问数组以显示的属性对象。The array is then iterated through to display the properties of the objects. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Map.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以确定指定的索引集合中的对象。Use the method to determine the index of the specified object in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 依据的顺序对象会显示在集合具有对这些对象应用于菜单项的方式没有影响控件。The order in which objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a control. 如果菜单项绑定不是集合中，该方法将返回-1。If the menu item binding is not in the collection, the method returns -1. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的菜单项绑定在集合中出现多次，则返回第一个匹配项的索引。If the specified menu item binding appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来确定的索引集合中的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to determine the index of a object in the collection. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Map.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding binding) cil managed

span.span: The to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的 对象。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法从集合中移除指定的菜单项绑定。Use the method to remove the specified menu item binding from the collection. 然后按照该菜单项的所有项都将上都移以填充空白位置。All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position. 已移动的项的索引也会更新。The indexes of the moved items are also updated. > [!NOTE] > 集合可以包含 null 值，以及重复对象。The collection can contain null values, as well as duplicate objects. 或者，您可以删除菜单项从集合中特定索引使用方法。As an alternative, you can remove a menu item from a specific index in the collection by using the method. 您还可以删除所有菜单项集合中使用方法。You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 依据的顺序对象会显示在集合具有对这些对象应用于菜单项的方式没有影响控件。The order in which objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来删除集合中的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove a object from the collection. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Map.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml.
